title: Kan tawngtaina hlawhtlintirtu
lyrics:
Ka tawngtaina hlawhtlintirtu,
Thlamuanna ka ngen a.
Lungngaiin mangang mah ila,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

Nangmah angin awm ka duh e,
Nangmah ka hmangaitu;
Fel taka ka awm theih lohvin,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

I lawmna hmu tlak ka ni lo,
Sual ka nih avangin;
I hnena kal tlak ka ni lo,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

Ka vengte leh ka chhungtein,
Min duh lo mah sela;
Thianten min kalsan selangin,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

Kan khawvelah i lo kal a,
Kraws chunga i thiha
Vana i tawngtai avangin,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

Kohhranho zinga awm turin,
Thihna hlau lo turin;
Vana fel tak awm turin,
Aw Lalpa, min hnar suh.

Mi nung, mitthi ngaihtuah turin,
Ropui leh zahawmin;
Chhum zinga i lo kal hunin,
Aw Lalpa, Min hnar suh.
